description: Helped build a SaaS application for crypto payments with a focus on scalability and security.
Worked on distributed system design, backend architecture, and RESTful API development.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate features and improve deployment workflows.
Contributed as a software developer in a fast-paced startup, delivering real-world solutions through innovative software projects.
Improved the template builder by adding new features to enhance customization and user experience.
Worked with cross-functional teams to streamline deployment workflows and ensure faster releases.
Built a fully-functional admin panel with RESTful API integrations for improved data control.
Optimized React components to improve load performance and responsiveness.
Collaborated with backend engineers to ensure seamless data integration across the stack.
